name: google_images
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool google_search_2.
Tool description: Serpdog(https://serpdog.io) is a Google Search API that allows you to access Google Search Results in real time. It solves the problem of proxies and captchas for a smooth scraping journey. Serpdog supports results in both HTML and JSON format.

Get your free trial by registering at https://api.serpdog.io

If you want to buy our plan, I recommend you to please visit https://serpdog.io/pricing for more information. 
API description: Fetches JSON data of image results from Google Images based on a query and various optional parameters.

query.description: The search query for the images.

gl.description: The country to use for the search. Defaults to 'us'.

hl.description: The language to use for the search. Defaults to 'en_us'.

duration.description: The time duration for the search (e.g., 'd' for day, 'w' for week).

lr.description: The language restriction for the search.

ijn.description: Index of the search results page. Defaults to '0'.

device.description: The device to use for the search (e.g., 'desktop', 'mobile'). Defaults to 'desktop'.
